member.name: CANDIDATEFORM
member.summary: Contains position information for the candidate window.

member.name: CANDIDATEFORM.dwIndex
member.summary: Candidate list identifier. It is 0 for the first list, 1 for the second, and so on. The maximum index is 3.

summary.para: Position style. This member can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: Display the upper left corner of the candidate list window at the position specified by ptCurrentPos. The coordinates are relative to the upper left corner of the window containing the list window, and are subject to adjustment by the system.
Exclude the candidate window from the area specified by rcArea. The ptCurrentPos member specifies the coordinates of the current point of interest, typically the caret position.

member.name: CANDIDATEFORM.ptCurrentPos
member.summary: A structure containing the coordinates of the upper left corner of the candidate window or the caret position, depending on the value of dwStyle.

member.name: CANDIDATEFORM.rcArea
member.summary: A structure containing the coordinates of the upper left and lower right corners of the exclusion area.
